title: Kinematics - average acceleration from a graph

content.question: What is the average acceleration of the object between times <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="t equals 6, t sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>6</mn> <msub> <mi>t</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, and denominator 3 t sub 0, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, and denominator t sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="2 v sub 0, end sub, times t sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="6 v sub 0, end sub, times t sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, and denominator 3 t sub 0, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
